title: A basic town
template: The town of {^community_town_name}, located in the {^biome_adjective} {^biome_type}, is populated by [33d10] {!race_plural}, [25d8] {!race_plural}, [2d8] {!race_plural}, and [2d8] {!race_plural}. As you enter the town, you're greeted with the sounds of {!biome_urban_sound} and {!biome_urban_sound}. The smells of {!biome_urban_scent} and {!biome_urban_scent} fill your nose.

title: Quick kingdom
template: The {^nation_type} of {^nation_name}, is mostly populated by {race_plural}.

title: Tavern
template: At {^tavern_name}, you can buy {!tavern_food} for [1d12] copper or {!tavern_food} for [1d8] copper. It's specialty drink is a {tavern_drink}, sold for [1d4] silver.

title: Beware, traveller!
template: In the {^nation_type} of {^nation_name}, travelers avoid the {^biome_name} {^biome_type}, rumored to be cursed.

title: Nameless Founder
template: Legends say {community_town_name} was founded by a lone {race_singular} warrior in the heart of the {^biome_adjective} {^biome_type}.

title: Founder
template: Legends say {community_town_name} was founded by a lone {race_singular} warrior named {^name_human_{gender}} in the heart of the {^biome_adjective} {^biome}.
